reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good cooking facilities, very clean, spa pool, good parking and located in a quiet area of Rotorua a few minutes from the centre of town. It's not somewhere to stay if you're looking for 5 star luxury - but if you want somewhere clean, reasonable and convenient to stay as a stopover for a couple of nights whilst sightseeing then this is a good option.
reviews.title: Good value choice

reviews.text: We recently had 2 nights at this hotel and really enjoyed our stay. The ground floor studio unit we had was very spacious with 2 sofa beds in the lounge and a king bed in the bedroom. The motel is lovely and clean and very well tended - there is a nice courtyard, off road parking, hot tub and a small pool area. The motel is situated close to town and shopping but in a quiet street, and is reasonably priced.
reviews.title: Very nice place to stay

likes.liked: — high standards of upkeep and space

reviews.text: The kitchen facilities include the "shiniest "stainless steel sink and drainer I have ever seen in my life, a fridge, kettle, toaster, hob top and microwave and there is also adequate counter space and crockery to make preparing a meal easy.The lounge/dining area is big and has a glass dining table and 4 chairs as well as the sofas, TV and corner table. The bathroom is adequate with a separate toilet, shower and vanity sink - again all very clean. There is use of a laundry room with washing machine and seaparte tumble drier - $2 each and free laundry powder. After travelling around NZ for several days it was very nice to be able to both do some laundry and cook an evening meal for a change.
reviews.title: lovely place

reviews.text: I can definitely recommend this motel, and can say it one one of the nicest we stayed at in our 19 days in NZ. The owners, Paul and his wife, are very nice and helpful and also apply high standards of upkeep to all of the property, which make this motel an excellent choice for a stay in Rotorua - thankyou for a very nice stay, this place is a real credit to you - and I am very pleased that of the many choices of motel available we chose yours.
reviews.title: Nice, homey place
